mapper.insert: insert into dtb_restaurant (rname, raddress, rtel, rlat, rlng) values (#{rname}, #{rhomepage}, #{raddress}, #{rtel}, #{rinfo}, #{rlat}, #{rlng})
mapper.select: select * from dtb_restaurant where rno > 0 and (rname like CONCAT ('%', #{keyword}, '%' ) OR raddress like CONCAT ('%', #{keyword}, '%' ) OR rinfo like CONCAT ('%', #{keyword}, '%' ))
